title: [mob][photos] Use leading debouncer for better UX

body:
### Description

Callbacks in the Debouncer, when the debounce timer is not active, will now be called immediately rather than after the debounce duration.

For instance, when deleting a file from the home gallery, the change previously reflected in the UI only after 2 seconds (the debounce time of the home gallery). Now, it happens instantly.
